Key Match Events: Draymond Green had 13 points, 8 rebounds, and 7 assists before being ejected due to two technical fouls in a 33-second span.
Stephen Curry overcame a slow start to finish with 13 points, 8 rebounds, and 5 assists.
Jaren Jackson Jr. scored 32 points for Memphis.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ja Morant has begun doing some on-court shooting work and will undergo imaging on his injured hip and pelvis area early next week.
G Lindy Waters III fell to the floor after blocking a shot with 1:58 left in the second quarter and didn't return due to a hyperextended left knee.
Others: The game was a physical NBA Cup game.
The Grizzlies rely heavily on their reserves.
